# kCGImagePropertyOpenEXRDictionary

**Global Variable**

A dictionary of properties specific to the OpenEXR metadata standard.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCGImagePropertyOpenEXRDictionary: CFString
```

## Open EXR Properties

- **kCGImagePropertyOpenEXRAspectRatio**: The aspect ratio of the image.

items.description: The aspect ratio of the image.
items.name: kCGImagePropertyOpenEXRAspectRatio
